title: Lake Mead National Recreation Area: Natural Features & Ecosystems
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Natural Features & Ecosystems               Natural Features & Ecosystems          Lake Mead National Recreation Area (NRA) provides spectacular scenic vistas of Lake Mead and rugged and isolated backcountry. Striking and dramatic physical features include deep canyons, dry washes, sheer cliffs, distant mountain ranges, the lakes, colorful soils and rock formations and mosaics of different vegetation.
